stories.title: Fix header layout and logo positioning
ac: Logo sized appropriately (48-56px) to fit within 72px nav height
Nav content vertically centered within header
Logo and nav links aligned on same baseline
Header looks professional and balanced on all screen sizes
Remove logo overflow that causes visual issues
stories.notes: Current logo is 90px in a 72px nav - causes overflow. Reduce to ~48px and ensure proper vertical centering.

stories.title: Improve text contrast for WCAG AA compliance
ac: --text-muted changed from #6b7280 to #9ca3af (4.5:1 contrast ratio)
All body text meets WCAG AA (4.5:1 for normal, 3:1 for large)
Section descriptions readable against dark background
Footer text has sufficient contrast
Feature card descriptions clearly legible
stories.notes: Current #6b7280 on #04070d is ~4.0:1 - needs bump to ~#9ca3af for 5.5:1

stories.title: Add focus states and keyboard navigation
ac: All interactive elements have visible focus ring
Focus ring uses accent color with 2px offset
Skip-to-content link added for keyboard users
Demo steps keyboard accessible with Enter/Space activation
Tab order follows logical reading order
Focus states respect :focus-visible for mouse users
stories.notes: Use :focus-visible to show focus only for keyboard, outline-offset: 2px

stories.title: Add ARIA labels and semantic improvements
ac: Main landmark wraps page content
Nav has aria-label='Main navigation'
Demo section has role='region' with aria-label
Interactive demo steps have aria-pressed state
Terminal code blocks have aria-label describing content
Decorative SVGs have aria-hidden='true'
stories.notes: Screen readers need context for custom interactive elements

stories.title: Add premium entrance animations with stagger
ac: Hero elements animate with spring easing cubic-bezier(0.16, 1, 0.3, 1)
Stagger delay of 100ms between hero elements
Elements start from opacity 0, translateY 40px
Animation duration 0.8s for smooth feel
Nav fades in after page load with subtle slide
Animations only play once on load
stories.notes: Spring easing gives premium Framer-like feel. Current fadeUp is good but can be enhanced.

stories.title: Enhance scroll-triggered reveal animations
ac: Workflow cards stagger in with 100ms delay each
Feature cards stagger with 80ms delay
Demo steps reveal with scale-up effect
Benchmark section slides in from bottom
CTA section has subtle scale animation
Use IntersectionObserver with 15% threshold
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion
stories.notes: Current reveal exists but can be more premium with varied effects per section

stories.title: Add micro-interactions on hover states
ac: Nav links have underline slide-in from left on hover
Buttons have subtle glow pulse on hover
Workflow cards have 3D tilt effect on hover (subtle)
Feature icons scale and glow on card hover
Demo steps have border gradient animation on hover
All transitions use 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4, 0, 0.2, 1)
stories.notes: Keep micro-interactions subtle and professional - don't overdo it

stories.title: Add smooth scroll with active nav highlighting
ac: Smooth scroll to sections with 80px offset for fixed header
Active nav link highlights based on scroll position
Active state uses accent color underline
IntersectionObserver tracks which section is in view
Scroll spy updates on both scroll and resize
stories.notes: scroll-behavior: smooth already exists, add active state tracking

stories.title: Add loading state and page transition polish
ac: Page has subtle fade-in on load to prevent FOUC
Body starts with opacity 0, animates to 1
Starfield canvas fades in after 200ms
Navigation slides down from top on load
All content waits for fonts to load before animating
stories.notes: Prevents flash of unstyled content and creates premium first impression

stories.title: Final accessibility audit and reduced motion support
ac: All animations disabled when prefers-reduced-motion is set
Static starfield for reduced motion users
Alternative focus indicators work without animation
Page fully functional without JavaScript
Test with screen reader - all content accessible
Lighthouse accessibility score 95+
stories.notes: Final polish pass ensuring site works for all users
